thinking.disposable_income: Auburn Gresham has a median household income lower than the city average, indicating limited disposable income for many residents.
thinking.discretionary_consumption: Residents in Auburn Gresham may prioritize essential spending over discretionary consumption due to lower income levels, making cost-sensitive policies more appealing.
thinking.accessibility: Public transit is a crucial mode of transportation for Auburn Gresham residents, with many relying on it for commuting to work and accessing services. Improving transit efficiency and affordability is important.
thinking.decision_rationale: Given the lower disposable income, policies with lower transit fares and moderate sales taxes are preferred to minimize financial burden. Reducing travel time is also important to improve accessibility and quality of life. Therefore, proposals with lower fares and moderate driver fees that reduce travel time are prioritized. A balance between tax rates and fare/fee structures is crucial to ensure affordability while enhancing transit services.
